page.title: 10THATCHERS ARMS RADLEY GREEN
page.content: This building is surrounded by peace- ful countryside.It has been a pub for at least 200 years.It is the "local" and social centre of{COOKSMILL GREEN} and{RADLEY GREEN.}Regulars call it the CUCKOO probably because it used to own a cuckoo clock. Most customers live in the neighbourhood,between 50 and 60 are regulars.On Friday evenings the pub is crowded,up to 100 squeeze in. Sunday lunchtime is also very busy and often ends up with sing-songs accom- panied by a piano accordion. Lunch- times and evenings in the early part of the week are quiet.There is 1 large bar,converted from 3 small rooms.Open fires and wood panelling give a very cosy feeling.The pub has a Darts,Dom- ino and Football team. They practise in the pub and garden.Sometimes they play other pub teams.Meals are served, but the main attraction is{REAL ALE.
